headline: In 5 Minutes, He Lets the Blind See
snippet: A Nepali ophthalmologist who pioneered a $25 operation to remove cataracts has restored sight to more than 100,000 people.

headline: Martin Shkreli’s Arrest Gives Drug Makers Cover
snippet: Pharmaceutical executives can look at the federal indictment and say that Martin Shkreli is an aberration, a rotten apple, but his arrest is not likely to make concern about drug prices go away.

headline: Valeant’s Drug Price Strategy Enriches It, but Infuriates Patients and Lawmakers
snippet: A pharmaceutical company buys old drugs and increases the price multifold, a profitable business model that is drawing anger and making the traditional drug industry nervous.
